name: posthog databricks plugin
description: The PostHog Databrics plugin allows you to track your users' interactions with your website using the Databrics platform.

config.markdown: This plugin will enable users with databricks data ingestion capabilities to track their interactions

config.name: Domain Name
config.description: Domain name of your databrics cloud instance

config.name: API Key
config.description: API key of your databrics cloud instance

config.name: File Name
config.description: Default filename for the csv file

config.name: Python Support File Upload
config.description: Default filename for python job file

config.name: Cluster Id
config.description: Get cluster details from the databricks portal

config.name: Database Name
config.description: Database name to store the data
